text:
This restaurant is evaluating for their food not their local brew beer. The two star was given due to after food experience. After dine their food I have to go to restroom several time. It take me a day to clear my stomach pain. Some of the food is not up to the quality. 

The restaurant do have a lot of customers. Seem like a good joint. Especially the private local brew beer. It has the brewery just next to it with tour. I did not try it. I am straight to the restaurant. 

I got the blackened rock shrimp and the Belgium Blonde. I like the Belgium blonde beer. The rock shrimp dish include the spinach fettuccine, mushroom, andouille sausage, yellow bell pepper. The sauce is creamy. The rock shrimp is firm. Not sure which item did not measured up cause stomach diarrhea. May be the sauce. Anyhow my experience is not good with the food.

I walk in this place try to compare with the one in Brandon. Surprisingly they were not busy at Friday night. I remember the Brandon location take about 4 months to slow down from crazy line to normal busy line. This place is not very busy at all as they told me on the phone when I call to check. The dog house is still there if you want to have the picture. 

We have coupon for a free fried. I have order the half slab baby back a la carts and fried halibut. The baby back is below average. The temperature is warm and is not right. It is dinner standard compare to many wood grilled place. The halibut is definitely disappointed. The fast food fish sandwich place can do better on the crispy coating than this place. The accompanying lettuce is soggy. All food temperature is not good other the fried is right.  The food delivery is way behind schedule. Too slow at a slow day. 

Am I going to return. No, done from my check list. Not even the coupon can bring me back.

We excited for new kid in the block due to our past experience with fresh kitchen on other location. Finally there is one just close to the mall. It make the location easy before I go to the movie to fill my energy. Parking in the front is limited but there are plenty of parking space at the back. 

I like the theme with pink color. Pink color stand for sweet, nice, playful, cute, romantic, charming, feminine, and tenderness. This may be why they found their food. I got the six. Which mean 2 protein, 2 bases, 2 veggies. That is the biggest bowl you can get. After that just add addition. I have Ahi tuna poke, Herb grilled steak, green bean, roasted mushrooms, coconut ginger rice, sweet potatoes noodle. I have add on as pesto tomato. You think by now you have big bowl. That was not. It was not even full to the top. 

After two hours, I have to run to restroom several time. The food didn't seat well. It is just not fresh. Because this incident,  I think it will be 2 stars. In compare to other Fresh Kitchen, this location need some work.

This time of year supposedly very nice out. However, this year weather is cook up in the high temperatures side. This is a special event to welcome the new year ahead of us. The name is midnight in the garden, it is funny we are actually at the top of parking garage. Nice name to attract. We can said finally see the beautiful people of Tampa who dress up. I would said it is the top 80% beautiful people who attend this party. You know who is included :) 

It does have the stunning skyline for the Tampa. A good view to fireworks. You can see two fireworks in the horizon. I would said the fireworks is at least half mile from the city river walk fireworks and 1.5 mile from channelside. The night include all you can drink bar and party live music. The music selection is upbeat and current. This is the positive. My friend warn me about the bathroom and drink line. This year they improve it. 

However, the party is a bit over price for the face value. The reasons follow. 1. The drink is not the your typical mix drink place with great mixologist. 2. The drink do not have a good choice. Even for beer and wine. 3. The fire work is actually still far away. 4. No food!!!! 5. Security is lack off. No check on the purse. 

I do have the good times with some of the yelper.

I was exiting to try a Puertorican Bistro. This place is small and not much of parking space. But there is a empty lot behind the building that you can park there. The plaza parking on the side of building is limited. 

The restaurant has vibrant music. The music are nice and Latin flavor. I am not sure how it work so I walk to counter order and wait for my food. I have order the roasted penil. A Puerto Rico roast pork shoulder. I waited for my food for some time and the people who order the food after me already got their food. At least three tables. Finally some come to table ask me what I have ordered. They when back to the kitchen and comeback to me said they sold all the penil and they can offer me the beef stew combination. I got that. 

Seem like the beef stew is over cook and when you press the meat it shatters to powder. They not the same as fresh cook beef cube. 

Four mistakes on this restaurant. First mistake did not have a hostess and call themselves Bistro. Second inform the customers late about run out of food. Three, no make up or complimentary item for their mistakes. Fourth is offer a dish that is not popular. Seem like the item cannot sale on the night. This is done and done restaurant.

Tree house is very hip. But it do not have my vote. There are several reasons that they are two stars in my book. First, service is too slow. We have to wait for long time to be serve, get a drink and pay out. Second, the hostess has table but have us wait for 20 minutes for seat. They seat people who come later a lot faster after we are seated. Third, food is not rememberable or not at it best. 

We order the chicken waffle and fried chicken. This two item is not impressed. Seem the food is warm which mean it has been seat on the counter sometimes. The waffle is just ok. The fried chicken just average. I am guessing they do well is many young people like it. Seem like Sunday brunch is good goR them. But for me this is been there done that deal.

We have a very off night from this place. We have a group of four went to this place for the ramen. We hope to try some of the new and hot place in town. However, we do not have the good experience tonight. 

We came to this place after the museum night at downtown. We arrive at 7:20 and one of friend family just finish and they let us have the table. Thanks to him that we have no waiting on the table. We put our order in for the food and we order the sake. The sake is a good deal. We have finished our sake and the appetizer has not arrived. It took them 1.25 hour to bring out the appetizer. Before the app is out, I told my friend we should walk out if the food did not come in one hour. However, we are eager to try this restaurant food and we stay and wait for the excitement of the food. 

We waited close to 1.5 hour before our ramen came. We were wonder why it take so long. The food came and I immediately disappointed what we have longing for. The ramen is sticking together and the noodle is not separated. The meat may be cook extreme long time and the meat is easily broken into powder pieces. The soup is considering average on the miso base. I have better ramen in Tampa compare to this place. I not even need to compare to the standard in Japan that I have experience. 

I had ramen in clear broth base, miso base, spicy base, and dry base before. The meat of other place is moist and good for the pork. The good ramen place has marinated egg in half broil. When you break the egg yolk, the yolk will spill into the broth and create another sensation. This place the yolk is complete cooked. 

The output of this restaurant needs to be rethinking. In Japan, I have seen 50 bowls of ramen in 30 minutes but not in this place. I know this is art but also need to consider the wait of the customer. Lack of efficiency, technique, material. I am award 2 stars. Many rooms need improvement.

This location is not comparable with the largo location. Every time I call, they don't have the blue crab. Somehow they need to remove from the menu. Although they don't have blue crab, I decided to paid them a visit to try other items in the menu. 

I order a 15 fried shrimp and scallops special. The 15 shrimp is about $10 and the scallops is $5. The wait is the main problem for this store. I was informed about 15 minutes to 20 minutes wait. It end up the wait is 35 minutes. The size of the shrimp is tiny. 

The taste is not nearly good. It is about same as frozen quality from supermarket. $16 total is in the high side for take out standard. A lot of improvement can be made for this store.

I don't know I come to wrong time or the clerk do not take the order seriously. The coffee we got on the 16 OZ cup with half coffee fill and the rest is whip cream. That tell you what is missing out. This is about 2.5 stars coffee joint. 

This store basically is below of the apartment. Many USF students live here. The store front is visible from 42nd street. But there is no parking spot. Basically this is Neighborhood store only for the people who live there. The people who is there have their own drinks. This tell me something wrong for the customers mind set. 

There many things wrong here. To correct it is difficult. Now with not attractive coffee quantity and expensive cup of joe. I would said very hard to compete at all.

I went to the movie with a group of yelp friend to see the girl scream movie. Our arriving was on time. It did not give us more time to look at the popcorn or drink. Only enough time for rest room before the show. The restroom is clean and nice.

The theater facility is just average. The most important thing for the movie goers is the chair.  The chair that we got cannot recline or push forward. This is very uncomfortable for two hours movie. Furthermore, the chair seat cushion cannot be up right to allow people stand up and let the other people pass in front of you. Basically either you have to squeeze between the knees of the person who are seated and pass them through the other side or take a long walk down to the front row to get to other side. The design is not great. The sound system is not the great. My home theater surround sound system is better than this. People come to theater instead of home is to enjoy the sound system, comfortable seat and thirdly the junk food.  

The theater have enough dim light for safety,  light walk way light, overhead dim light, clear mark exit light. It is save. However I prefer more exit such as exit near the screen. Our auditorium does not have that. With the above reason, I have experience better.

The update review is due to the recent visit. This time I bring a friend with me. Due my good experience on the last visit, I like to repeat it again. This time we ordered the appetizer. The food come out quick. 

We got the Lemon Chili Tuna Tar Tar. I like the decorations and presentation. This dish included the tuna tartare with 4 additional accompanying to share. It has kimchi cucumber, papaya relish, toast coconut, radish. It come with 4 strip of crackers. Before I start, I can smell very fishy on the tuna. We didn't suspect anything. It was a mistake that we eat it without question. We all have food poisoning that day. 

I think they need to check the quality and freshness of the ingredients. It was a bad experience.

This review is getting below their service and and miscommunication to any club play. We were show up and surprised to inform us the badminton court can be kick out if the rain come to outside pickle ball tournaments. We have to make room for their competition if it rain. This decision make because it may rain and the badminton club will be sacrificed to make room. 

They could have informed us not to come. Poor management on the center not to inform us ahead. Some of us travel 45 minutes to get here. Which is a waste. I don't like the ideal they can kick us out anytime. I rather inform us the center is use that day and cancel us instead of give us the unreasonable explanation.

This may be the low end H&M I have been to. I have been to so many of them but this one do not stand out. One positive note is they have cute baby section. The man and women section just simply not there. 

This store occupies good amount area in the mall. It does carry men, women and children. The best is the children. There were number of discounts you can find start from $3, $5, $10, and $15. The store is clean and in order.

This fast food chain is as it advertise star rating. Below average. I believe they don't know how to improve themselves. 

Below are the suggest improvement. 

1. Improve the response time to order at the drive through. The wait is too long for the drive through. 

2. Improve the drive in condition. Be ready to come out to make the order. 

3. The boneless wing is chicken breast. Don't like too much batter.

4. Improve staff training. If the customer pull to the window to paid, be ready to accept. 

I not sure they will be able to improve since this issue has been long time base on past review from other yelper who comments on this store.

The facilities of the gym offer multi phase of exercise. You can work out yourself in the gym with the equipment, team sport, aerobic class, personal trainer. They also have swimming pool, sauna, locker room. 

Not long ago they bought the life style gym and shut down the smaller life style gym. The member of the smaller gym now crowed to this location. Many of the good aerobic teacher left life style and the LA fitness organization, and only the mediocre teacher left. May be LA Fitness do not pay as well to the good gym teacher and they go to other gym. The crowed situation present a shortage of equipment. The class with 7.5 pound dun bar is run out the in the exercise class. Some of the member have to bring their own. I wonder why we paid so much and we have to bring our own exercise equipment. The swimming pool also get crowed. We have an experience that after they sale you the three year membership, they are changing their way of doing business to the bad side. 

The morning class become too crowed which don't have not enough room to reach out your hand during the aerobic class. The big gym sometime has the AC shut off to save the facilities electric bill and cause the member suffer without air while exercising. The management need to listen to the client suggestion to improve the situation. What ever the sale group promise you doesn't work since their operation side decide how the gym run. You have to know their operation group is different than the sales group. You can complaint to the sale group but the operation group won't change the way of business operated. And their answer is corporate policy. This two group within the LA fitness need to be clean up how they really want to run the business.

I am disappointed to their current operation after 4.5 year with them. As a result a two star is awarded.

Drop two star. Simply just not up to the game. This time just not measured up from many front. The waitress who serve us take 7 minutes still did not pass the bowl for us to fill up the food. Not even come to our table to get order. We have to tell the secondary server to get us a bowl to start. We are veterans not required explanation. Not need to wait to pass us a bowl. 

When we get to the food cart to fill the bowl to be cook, some ingredients are empty. The ingredients is just not as good as before. The squid must be in the freezer for long time. It is dry after cook. They use to have the bay scallops and it was removed from the ingredients. 

The sauce table is just too massy. The sauce just drip all over the place. No one come to check or clean. During or dinner there, never see a floor manager come to check. Many hang out at the bar area and left the waitress to handle 5 tables in one time. 

After dinner, the food did not sit well in stomach. What can I said. A lot let down in many front.

Today the YBOR City have the 3rd annual snow parrade. We decided for dinner before the parade. 

This restaurant is kind of away from the center attraction of the YBOR. It located at the 5th Ave and 17th Street. Two Avenue from central YBOR. 

This is Argentina restaurant. They must have done their churrasco correctly. I have order a  baby churrasco and my wife have Mar Y Tierra (surf and turf). While we waiting for the food, we can see across building with the kitchen that pounding the steak. 

Mar Y Tierra came with three grill shrimp, grill skirt steak low grade with a lot of tender. It also  has side rice and side salad. The shrimp is marinated and grill with perfection. The skirt steak also marinate and grill. This dish is yummy for the shrimp and the steak is tasty. No complain for the price of this dish $18. 

The baby churrasco is 8 oz compare to the full churrasco 22oz. The price different is $10. Since I just want to taste the strip cut of the churrasco, I order a baby. When the steak came out, it is a whole piece like my wife dish not like the strip size cut. This is incorrect. It have a lot tendon. I did not say anything because I think this may be the way they have prepare it. So I have finish it. Then my neighbor table order the full portion and I can see there is different of the meat - strip size churrasco not like the flat piece. The correct churrasco should a strip cut no tendon. They should not use the word "churrasco" if they not serve you the Falda cut in Spanish. I am agree the seasoning for the taste is there but the meat material quality is not there. Argentine should know their meat. 

The other thing is the waiter did not ask me how is my steak to be prepared and they came out well done. It was too late to change. The waiter also not attentive. My glass of the water was empty for long time and not come to refill. This restaurant waiter need to be trained. 

With the above experience, I have to give them 2 star.
